transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan sir, namaskar, aap swasth honge, dhanyavaad.
Executive: Haan ji boliye.
Customer: Aapne ek ticket raise kiya hai basically ki domain name change karna hai aapko.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Okay. To kya rakhna tha, naya wala domain kya rahega aapka? Abhi jo hai wo hai www.
Customer: Omega rubber.com
Customer: Hello, ab mujhe usme sirf pehle ye chahiye.
Executive: Hello
Customer: Sir aapki aawaz kaafi kam aa rahi hai, sorry to hear.
Customer: Ab aa rahi hai?
Executive: Haan ab proper aa rahi hai.
Customer: Haan na, ab ek baar mere ko sirf pehle aap ye check karke bataiye ki omegarubber.com jo domain hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Wo matlab actually ye kya bahut pehle bana tha to abhi mere paas bahut jyada aisa kuch idea nahi hai. Omega rubber aapke paas abhi iska access nahi hai?
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Iska access hai abhi aapke paas?
Customer: Haan main wahi puchna chah raha tha ki ye kahan se matlab ye hum logo ne domain kharid ke fir IndiaMART ko handover kiya tha ya IndiaMART ne kahin se kharid ke humko diya tha.
Executive: Okay, main ye basically ye jankari aapko chahiye ki IndiaMART ne ye domain aapko provide kiya ya aapne ye domain IndiaMART ko provide kiya.
Customer: Haan abhi abhi kiske paas hai ye domain?
Executive: Ye domain to sir abhi aapke paas hai, main domain ka dekh leta hu sir jo domain ka hamara hai.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Haan na, ek to wo ho gaya and secondly
Executive: Haan bataiye sir.
Customer: Haan na and uske baad iska domain matlab apna IndiaMART ke jo hai.
Customer: Haan theek hai. Aur dusra na ye iska domain name change karke omega rubber.in karna hai.
Executive: .com se .in karna hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Okay sir, ek second aap rukiye haan, ek second. Omegarubber.in to aapko ye .in aur .com ka pata hai.
Executive: Ek second rukiye, ek second rukiye.
Customer: Haan boliye haan boliye.
Executive: Sir .in aur .com ka aapko difference to pata hoga sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: .in aur .com mein aapko sir difference to pata hoga na. Like .com jo hota hai sir wo worldwide ke liye hota hai.
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Aur jo .in hota hai wo keval India, pan India basically India keval ke liye hota hai.
Customer: But wo dusri country wale bhi agar .in kholenge na to unko landing page to apna omega rubber wala dikhega. .in kholenge to bilkul dikhega sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: .in kholenge to bilkul dikh jayega sir. Main sir bas dekho clear karna tha wo hota hai call pe pehle sari cheezein unko haan wahi unko agar matlab .in bhi kholenge to unko website to dikh hi jayegi aisa koi restriction to hai nahi ki wala sirf India India wale log hi khol sakte hain na isliye koi dikkat nahi hai. Google pe jo bhi registered hai wo kahin se bhi access kar sakta hai. To chahe India ho chahe out of India ho. Wahi exactly exactly. To aise koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Haan ye check kar leta hu pehla to hamara jo concern tha wo ye tha ki jo domain hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aapne IndiaMART ko provide kiya tha ya IndiaMART ne aapko provide kiya tha. Jo secondly hamara ye hai ki jo hamara .com domain hai usko change karke humko .in karna hai right?
Customer: Haan pehle to pehle to mujhe .com ka matlab wo access chahiye rahega.
Executive: Hmm. Agar sir humne provide karega to bilkul access milega aapko. In case agar aapne hame diya ho to in that case access aapke paas hi hoga.
Customer: Okay theek hai, alright.
Executive: Haan agar sir ye domain agar humne create kiya hoga. Haan to main kuch puchna ye chahta hu. Haan ki fir bhi change karwana hai agar humne diya hai to fir to aap jitne time aapka wo service chalega utne time domain active rahega sir usko to aapko bhi pata hai. Haan lekin agar aapne hame provide kiya hai in that case aapko domain ka renewal karana rehta hai jab wo expire hota hai. That's totally fine usme koi dikkat nahi hai. Mujhe mujhe to wahi pata karna hai ki hai kiske paas access and mujhe uska abhi access chahiye rahega.
Customer: .com ka and jo IndiaMART ka jo website hai that is to be shifted to omegarubber.in.
Executive: Okay to matlab jo hamara final website jayega wo omegarubber.in pe jayega. Bas aapko .com ka access chahiye rahega. Bas aapko .com ka hai wo access chahiye rahega.
Customer: Yes yes. Main ye puchna chah raha hu sir kisi number pe hamari dobara baat hogi?
Executive: Dobara isi number pe main call karke isi aapko confirm kar du na.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai, alright.
Executive: No problem.
Customer: Aapko koi aur jankari nahi chahiye sir aapko?
Customer: Ahh.
Executive: Abhi filhal to nahi. Ek baar .in pe usko shift karenge na uske baad fir thode bahut content mein jo bhi changes lagenge wo main aapko aapke sath coordinate karke wo karwa lunga.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul sir koi dikkat nahi hai. Haan na. Okay sir thank you. Team wagera wo sab baad ki baat hai pehle ek baar. Bilkul main aapko turant confirm kar deta hu ek baar apne team se check karke. Haan na okay.
Executive: Okay alright. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to change domain name to omegarubber.in.

- Needs access to the current .com domain.

- Wants to know who owns the current domain.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed domain is currently with customer.

- Executive will check who owns the domain.

- Executive clarified .in vs .com domain differences.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back to confirm domain ownership.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- domain, change, access, ownership, website
